package.name: blackboardletters
package.author: Jordan Matelsky
package.description: Blackboard or double-barred lettering in Espanso
package.title: Blackboard Letters

manifest.author: Jordan Matelsky
manifest.description: Blackboard or double-barred lettering in Espanso
manifest.name: blackboardletters
manifest.title: Blackboard Letters

value.readme:
Blackboard characters in [Espanso](https://espanso.org/), such as ð”¸ or â„¤ or â„‚


## mnemonic

Type `\\bb` followed by the character you want to write in blackboard font. For example:


`\\bbA` â†’ ð”¸

The `\\` double-slash is chosen to avoid this colliding with LaTeX commands.
